nodes.text: Jilrua was a desert planet that orbited a blue giant star within the Jilrua system of the galaxy's Hutt Space region, in the immediate vicinity of the Oktos Nebula.

Jilrua was the homeworld of the Jilruans, a war-like sentient species that was conquered by members of the Hutt species and that contributed soldiers to the Hutt armies by the year 25,100 BBY. The planet was rarely visited by outsiders.
Jilrua was first mentioned in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book co-authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the planet in grid square R-12.
